001package gbw.melange.common;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.mesh.services.IMeshPipelineConfig;
004import gbw.melange.common.shading.services.IShadingPipelineConfig;
005
006import java.util.Set;
007
008public interface IMelangeConfig {
009
010    enum LogLevel {
011        BOOT_SEQ_INFO,
012        SPRING_REFLECT_INFO,
013        PIPELINE_STATUS,
014        ELEMENT_UPDATES,
015        VIEW_INFO,
016        HOOKS,
017        IMPROPER_API_USAGE,
018        PIPELINE_ISSUES;
019    }
020
021    void resolve();
022    /**
023     * Cache shaders on disk and sample as textures to increase performance.
024     *
025     * @default true
026     */
027    IMelangeConfig useCaching(boolean yesNo);
028
029    boolean getUseCaching();
030
031    /**
032     * Gain further information about any number of topics related to the framework runtime and boot sequence.
033     *
034     * @default all
035     */
036    IMelangeConfig setLoggingAspects(Set<LogLevel> values);
037
038    Set<LogLevel> getLoggingAspects();
039
040    IMelangeConfig setShadingConfig(IShadingPipelineConfig shadingConfig);
041    IShadingPipelineConfig getShadingConfig();
042    IMelangeConfig setMeshConfig(IMeshPipelineConfig meshConfig);
043    IMeshPipelineConfig getMeshConfig();
044
045
046    /**
047     * Clear any generated content from the assets/system/generated folder when the program exits.
048     *
049     * @default false
050     */
051    IMelangeConfig clearGeneratedContentOnExit(boolean yesNo);
052
053    boolean getClearGeneratedOnExit();
054
055    /**
056     * Clear any generated content from the assets/system/generated folder when the program starts.
057     *
058     * @default true
059     */
060    IMelangeConfig clearGeneratedOnStart(boolean yesNo);
061
062    boolean getClearGeneratedOnStart();
063
064    IMelangeConfig enableGLDebug(boolean yesNo);
065
066    boolean getEnableGLDebug();
067
068
069}
